item.title: Reconstructing the role of landuse change on water yield at the Maya urban
item.description: This project is the hydrology-lake modeling part of the project Land, Water, and Territory: A 3,000-Year Study of Niche Construction and Cultural Evolution in the Tikal National Park, Guatemala. The view in Tikal Introduction of project Location of Tikal ## Tasks in hydrologic modeling Land use map of Tikal Elevation of Tikal Accomplishment of the project keep updating
